alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Leon; Limestone; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Freestone, northeastern Robertson, Leon, Limestone and southern Anderson Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms across portions of Central Texas. The strongest storm was near Buffalo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palestine, Mexia, Groesbeck, Teague, Fairfield, Buffalo, Elkhart, Wortham, Centerville, Fairfield Lake, Lake Mexia, Twin Oak Reservoir, Fort Parker State Park, Fort Boggy State Park, Fairfield Lake State Park, Camp Creek Lake, Lake Limestone, Corinth, Jewett, and Hilltop Lakes. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 152 and 212. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
